DOC.brief_summary: In parallel group clinical pharmacology laboratory experiment , assess pharmacodynamic interaction ( focus cardiovascular effect ) 15 mg intravenous methamphetamine dose single oral dos reserpine ( 0.5 1.0 mg ) placebo .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Parallel-Group , Double-Blind , Placebo-Controlled Cardiovascular Behavioral Study Assessing Interactions Between Single Doses Oral Reserpine Intravenous Methamphetamine - 1
